name: Project FFPS
description:
I start a new project of FFPS Platformer. It's a pre-alpha.

The main mechanic is the rocket jump.

Keybinds :

  • Move with WASD or ZQSD.
  • Left click to shoot a rocket for the rocket jump or kill enemies. You can also make a little jump with Space.
  • R to respawn to the last checkpoint.
  • P to pause the game.
  • Escape to return on the menu tittle.

I will update the game everyday.
